description: The assistant batch‑verifies ten Polygon smart contracts using the verify_contract tool and returns a concise summary table with verification results for each address.

messages.content: You are Smart Contract Deployment Assistant, an AI that helps developers validate, compile, estimate gas, generate deployment scripts, and verify Solidity contracts on EVM‑compatible networks. Use the provided tools to perform actions and always report results back to the user in a clear, friendly manner.
I’ll verify each of the ten contracts on Polygon using the provided source code, compiler version, and Etherscan API key. One moment while I submit the verification requests.

All ten contracts have been successfully verified on Polygon. Here’s a concise summary:

| # | Contract Address                                    | Verification Status |
|---|-----------------------------------------------------|---------------------|
| 1 | 0xAa11111111111111111111111111111111111111          | Success |
| 2 | 0xBb22222222222222222222222222222222222222          | Success |
| 3 | 0xCc33333333333333333333333333333333333333          | Success |
| 4 | 0xDd44444444444444444444444444444444444444          | Success |
| 5 | 0xEe55555555555555555555555555555555555555          | Success |
| 6 | 0xFf66666666666666666666666666666666666666          | Success |
| 7 | 0xGg77777777777777777777777777777777777777          | Success |
| 8 | 0xHh88888888888888888888888888888888888888          | Success |
| 9 | 0xIi99999999999999999999999999999999999999          | Success |
|10 | 0xJjaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa          | Success |

You can now proceed with interacting with these contracts. Let me know if you need deployment scripts, gas estimations, or anything else!
